text: Over the last few days , the Taleban dispatched a number of their troops from [ the capital of northern Balkh Province ] Mazar-e Sharif under the command of Qayum and Hashim to Takhar . At the same time , a number of troops were sent to the Dara-e Suf area [ Samangan Province ] led by commander Yari and commander Samar from the Dehdadi military fort near Mazar-e Sharif .
